message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I am looking for a better deal. Could you consider selling it to me for $14000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $16000. This is the lowest I can go, considering the product's value to me.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've considered it, but I still believe there's room for negotiation. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $15500?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $16750. This is my final compromise, considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I think we can get closer. Could you consider selling the product to me for $16000?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I can offer it to you for $16250. This is my last offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I understand your position, Alice. Let's try one more time. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $16000?
I've already stated my final offer, Bob. I'm not willing to budge any further. You're going to have to make a decision based on the offers I've made so far.
